display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
React SPA (Vite)
UI/UX, State Mgmt (React Query)

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
API Gateway (FastAPI)
Entry Point, Auth (JWT), Routing, CORS, SSE Proxy

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
User Service (FastAPI)
Handles User Accounts & Auth Logic

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
VCard Service (FastAPI)
Manages VCard Data & Assets

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center;

span.p:
QR Service (FastAPI)
Generates QR Code Images

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Redirect Service (FastAPI)
Handles QR Scan Redirection & Initiates Tracking

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Analytics Service (FastAPI)
Tracks Scans, Aggregates Data, Provides SSE

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
MongoDB
Stores User Profiles, VCard Details, Aggregated Analytics

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
Redis
Caches Scan Events, Real-time Counters

div.style: display: table; white-space: break-spaces; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 200px; text-align: center; width: 200px;

span.p:
MinIO (S3 API)
Stores VCard Profile Photos, Static Assets

div.style: display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 10px; text-align: center;
display: table-cell; white-space: normal; line-height: 1.5; max-width: 10px; text-align: center;
